Our Volcano Picture ALbum Link
These pictures can't speak for the joy that we had today, but I hope it

It wasn't the prettiest volcano but the kids made it and that to me is what
makes it great. :-)

Thanks again all,
Sandy

messages.messageBody:
Our Volcano Picture ALbum Link
These pictures can't speak for the joy that we had today, but I hope it gives you an idea of what we did.

It wasn't the prettiest volcano but the kids made it and that to me is what makes it great. :-)

Thanks again all,
Sandy
